en.e_gift_code_help: How to use a gift code?
en.e_help_app: For mobile device, open ${product_name} and select Settings, Upgrade to Pro, then you’ll see the Redeem at the bottom of screen, paste the gift code above in the input box.
en.e_help_web: For website, sign in ${site_domain} and select Avatar, Settings, Redeem, then paste the gift code above in the input box.
en.e_help:
Gift code does not support refund.
Contact us at support@${site_domain} if you have any question.

zh.title: ${product_name}高级账户兑换码
zh.e_thanks: 感谢您购买${product_name}高级账户兑换码，以下是一年期高级账户兑换码。

zh.e_help_web: 网页端：「设置」-「兑换」- 输入兑换码
zh.e_help:
购买兑换码不支持退款。
如有任何疑问，请通过 support@${site_domain} 联系我们。
